strapiEvent.name: Opal Agafia’s Ozark Mountain Soul Fest
strapiEvent.description:
Opal Agafia’s Ozark Mountain Soul Fest will bring three days of live music, three nights of camping, and various vendors and activities to The Farm in Eureka Springs from Jun 15-17.

Located in the heart of the Ozark Mountains, the music festival

  • The venue: Placing its primary focus on Americana-Roots music, the festival delivers a variety of genres amidst the beautiful Ozark scenery of The Farm, which was awarded Venue of the Year during the Arkansas Country Music Awards earlier this week.
  • The lineup: The weekend features an exciting lineup of local and national talent, including Opal Agafia, The SteelDrivers, Vince Herman Band, and Monk is King. There are ticket options for the entire three days, two days, or Saturday only, and event tickets include camping passes.

See the festival schedule and purchase tickets HERE.
